titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to suspend future reductions of the highest income tax rate if there exists a Federal on-budget deficit.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to suspend future reductions of the highest income tax rate if there exists a Federal on-budget deficit.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that if there exists a Federal on-budget deficit income tax rate reductions in the highest rate shall be suspended until it is determined that such a deficit does not exist.
